text: Peter Braun is a West German para-alpine skier. He represented West Germany at alpine skiing at the 1976 Winter Paralympics. He won the bronze medal at the Men's Giant Slalom IV B event, the only event he competed in. == See also == * List of Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Germany Category:Alpine skiers at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1976 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for West Germany Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing
title: Peter Braun (skier)
